scripts.fix-newlines: find . \( -type d -name "out" -o -name "node_modules" -o -name ".next" -o -name "build" -o -name ".vercel" -o -name "coverage" \) -prune -o -type f -not -path '*/\.git/*' -exec sh -c 'file "$1" | grep -q "text" && { echo "Checking $1"; git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1 && git check-ignore -q "$1" 2>/dev/null && echo "Skipped (ignored): $1" || { tail -c1 "$1" | grep -q . && echo "Adding newline to $1" && echo "" >> "$1"; }; }' _ {} \;
